item.title: SAMPLE OF SAFETY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS
item.description: Table of Contents AC 120-49 Safety Performance Indicators_3. SAMPLE OF SAFETY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS AC 120-32D Safety Management System_Table ATT 5-2-1 Safety Performance Indicator Samples 系统问题指标 Indicators for systems issue 业务问题指标 Indicators for operational issue 监测外部因素指标 Indicators to monitor external factors :ID: 60A910C5-1B05-4C03-BF84-5E6720E49ACE AC 120-49 Safety Performance Indicators_3. SAMPLE OF SAFETY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS First tier SPIs Number of aviation accidents: no accidents Second tier SPIs Reducing the 10 year moving average of serious incidents rate of national airline aircraft by 5/million flight hours.
